mapper.select: SELECT act.ACTIVITY_NUMBER as activityNumber, act.CASE_NUMBER as caseNumber, act.TYPE as type, cb1.CODE_NAME as typeName, act.STATUS as status, cb2.CODE_NAME as statusName, act.SUBJECT as subject, act.DETAIL as detail, act.BU_ID as buId, act.OWNER_CODE as ownerCode, act.DEPT_CODE as deptCode, CONCAT(u.FIRST_NAME, ' ', u.LAST_NAME) as ownerName , act.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, act.CREATED_BY as createdBy , act.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate, act.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy FROM TB_CASE_ACTIVITY act LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_USER u on act.OWNER_CODE = u.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_codebook cb1 on act.TYPE = cb1.CODE_ID and cb1.CODE_TYPE ='ACT_TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_codebook cb2 on act.STATUS = cb2.CODE_ID and cb2.CODE_TYPE ='ACT_STATUS' WHERE act.CASE_NUMBER = #{caseNumber} AND act.BU_ID = #{buId} ORDER BY act.CREATED_DATE DESC
